version_description:
- Modified animation sequencing to speed up play.
- Added tap to play for Baker’s Game and Baker’s Game Easy.
- Bug fixes and performance improvements.

- NEW! Play and compete with friends via Match Play.
- Added fast tap play to stock pile.
- Moved the Leaderboard button to within Stats.
- Modified New and Restart confirmation popups.
- Updated for iOS9 and iPhone 6S/6S+.
- Performance improvements and bug fixes.

- NEW! Play and compete with friends via Match Play.
- Added fast tap play to stock pile.
- Moved the Leaderboard button to within Stats.
- Modified New and Restart confirmation popups.
- Updated for iOS9 and iPhone 6S/6S+.
- Performance improvements and bug fixes.

- NEW! Play and compete with friends via Match Play.
- Added fast tap play to stock pile.
- Moved the Leaderboard button to within Stats.
- Modified New and Restart confirmation popups.
- Updated for iOS9 and iPhone 6S/6S+.
- Performance improvements and bug fixes.

- NEW! Replay the last game won.
- NEW! Fully optimized for iPad Pro.
- NEW! Setting to hide the Winning Deal indicator.
- Scorpion: Added tap to play, squashed bugs.
- Provisional: Enabled drag to reserve in all situations.
- FreeCell: Modified spacing, added tap to reserve option.

- NEW! Updated for iOS 10.
- NEW! Larger cards and hints for Klondike games.
- NEW! Badges for Match Play Challenges.
- Tap to Play: Added to Agnes Sorel, Creepy Crawly, Eight Off, Eight Off Easy and Penguin.
- Squashed a few bugs.
- Modified the Hints slider in Settings to deactivate all Hints when set to off.

- NEW! Streak Protector for big winning streaks.
- Updates for iOS 10.
- Squashed some bugs.

- Bug fixes
- Improved graphics compatibility

- NEW! Sync and backup your stats across multiple devices.
- NEW! Larger playing cards.
- NEW! Leaderboards for all 50 games.
- All games upgraded with tap-to-play capability.
- Updated app icon.
- Performance improvements.

- NEW! Custom card deck for retina devices.
- Minor bug fixes.

- See HOW TO WIN on any Winning Deal!
- Squashed some small bugs.

- NEW! See HOW TO WIN on any Winning Deal.
- Squashed some small bugs.

- NEW! See HOW TO WIN on any Winning Deal.
- Updates for iOS 11 and iPhone X.
- Squashed some small bugs.
